Name: Word
About the game: Type any verse in the Bible and record your best WPM for each verse-set (1 - 2 verses per set). Key Features: Type the entire Bible in any order you like. Word is a non-linear typing game in which you can type any book, chapter or verse in the Bible. Record your highest WPM for each verse-set. As you navigate the menus, if you have played a particular level before, your best WPM will be displayed; try to improve it! Think of Word as a long term game with tons of replay value; over time, type the entire Bible or just one book or just the famous verses and then go back to improve your score. Record your most efficient performance for each verse-set. Again, navigating the menus, if you have played the level previously, your best performance will be displayed; efficiency score increases with both higher-WPM and fewer-mistakes. Featuring Fidget !! Includes an ample sampling of super talented audio genius, Fidget! Choose his playlist on the options menu; the default gameplay audio is a satisfying Chopin piano playlist. Word makes use of the World English Bible (WEBP) The World English Bible is a Public Domain Modern English translation of the Holy Bible.
